data.taskTitle: IDE: Integrations page with Installed and Available tabs
IDE: Integrations page with Installed and Available tabs
data.approach: Refactor existing integrations page to two-tab layout (Installed/Available). The Installed tab keeps the existing configured sources list. The Available tab shows discovered plugins from /api/integrations/available with install-from-git functionality. Will restructure the page with tab switcher at top, keep service bar, and add the Available plugins grid.

IDE: Integrations page with Installed and Available tabs

summary: Created new /integrations route in IDE with two-tab layout
Implemented Installed tab showing configured integration sources
Developed Available tab displaying discoverable plugins
Added actions for editing, enabling/disabling, and testing integrations

suggestedTasks.title: Add Integration Configuration Form Validation
suggestedTasks.description:
Implement comprehensive form validation for integration configuration drawer. Validate git URLs, connection parameters, and handle edge cases. Focus on input sanitization and providing clear user feedback for configuration errors.

Target files: ide/src/routes/integrations/ConfigDrawer.svelte and related validation utilities.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure robust input handling for integration configurations

suggestedTasks.title: Create Unit Tests for Integrations Page Components
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop comprehensive unit and integration tests for the new Integrations page. Cover scenarios including empty states, plugin installation, source configuration, and connection testing.

Focus on testing components in ide/src/routes/integrations/ directory, ensuring full coverage of user interactions and edge cases.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve reliability and prevent potential regressions

patterns: Use DaisyUI for consistent component styling
Implement responsive design with mobile-first approach
Handle empty states with informative messaging

documentationNeeds: Update IDE user guide with new Integrations page workflow
Document available integration types and configuration process
